Edit.Name: prpAutoWind
Edit.Caption: Auto. wind
Edit.Help: This allows switching on or off the automatic wind algorithm. When the algorithm is switched off, the pilot is responsible for setting the wind estimate. [Circling] Requires only a GPS source. [ZigZag] Requires an intelligent vario with airspeed output. [Both] Use ZigZag and circling.

Edit.Name: prpTrailDrift
Edit.Caption: Trail drift
Edit.Help: Determines whether the snail trail is drifted with the wind when displayed in circling mode.
